data.meanings: to say/speak, to call, to be named, word/speech, utterance, a thing said, greeting, discourse, one who says/speaks. To inspire/transmit/relate/answer/think/profess, emit an opinion on, indicate a state or condition or circumstance. qa'ilun - speaker, indicator.
data.sentence: The word قَالُوا comes from the root ق و ل and is associated with the meanings: to say/speak, to call, to be named, word/speech, utterance, a thing said, greeting, discourse, one who says/speaks. To inspire/transmit/relate/answer/think/profess, emit an opinion on, indicate a state or condition or circumstance. qa'ilun - speaker, indicator.

The word مِنَ comes from the root م ن and is associated with the meanings: From

data.meanings: (lana)To soften, make tender, lenient, gentle, smooth.linatun - apalm-tree of which the dates are of very inferior quality and are unfit for human consumption.
data.sentence: The word لَنْ comes from the root ل ن and is associated with the meanings: (lana)To soften, make tender, lenient, gentle, smooth.linatun - apalm-tree of which the dates are of very inferior quality and are unfit for human consumption.

data.meanings: (Dal-Nun-Alif) To be near, come near or low, let down, be akin to.
data.sentence: The word الدُّنْيَا comes from the root د ن و and is associated with the meanings: (Dal-Nun-Alif) To be near, come near or low, let down, be akin to.

data.meanings: to relate, narrate, recite, choose, propose, transmit, raise, prefer, effect, excite.. To stir up, to trump up.. Determined/resolved/decided upon a thing.. Origin, time/period of life.. Dearth, scarcity, drought or sterility.. An iron instrument with which the bottom of a camel's foot is marked, or a camel with such a mark.. A generous quality/action (e.g. passed down from generation to generation).. athar means after, footstep/trace/mark/track/remnant/tradition/teaching, impression/influence, stamp/scar, remains, relics of knowledge transmitted, sunnah, vestige, print, memorial of antiquity.
data.sentence: The word نُؤْثِرَكَ comes from the root ا ث ر and is associated with the meanings: to relate, narrate, recite, choose, propose, transmit, raise, prefer, effect, excite.. To stir up, to trump up.. Determined/resolved/decided upon a thing.. Origin, time/period of life.. Dearth, scarcity, drought or sterility.. An iron instrument with which the bottom of a camel's foot is marked, or a camel with such a mark.. A generous quality/action (e.g. passed down from generation to generation).. athar means after, footstep/trace/mark/track/remnant/tradition/teaching, impression/influence, stamp/scar, remains, relics of knowledge transmitted, sunnah, vestige, print, memorial of antiquity.

data.meanings: to create out of nothing, cleave/split/crack/break, be broken into pieces, cleave asunder, begin to create. fitrat - natural disposition or constitution with which a child is created. The faculty of knowing God and capability of accepting the religion of truth, religion. fatir -creator, one of the names of Allah. futur - crack/flaw. munfatirun - split one, cloven one, one rent asunder.
data.sentence: The word فَطَرَنَا comes from the root ف ط ر and is associated with the meanings: to create out of nothing, cleave/split/crack/break, be broken into pieces, cleave asunder, begin to create. fitrat - natural disposition or constitution with which a child is created. The faculty of knowing God and capability of accepting the religion of truth, religion. fatir -creator, one of the names of Allah. futur - crack/flaw. munfatirun - split one, cloven one, one rent asunder.
